name: Jumbob's Arcade
description:
THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS - I APPRECIATE ANY FEEDBACK

Built for Oculus Quest 2 (Quest 1 hasn't been tested but may work).

Jumbob's Arcade is where I will be creating VR mini games with a focus on high scores, just like in the old-school arcades of yesteryear. 

Games are designed to be played quickly with no long loading times.

The gameplay will generally be easy to learn, hard to master.

Compete locally against friends and family and beat those high scores!

Online leaderboards will be introduced in a future update.

More games coming soon.

Game 1: BALL BARRAGE

You have 9 lives, and you'll need them. Grab a bat, paddle, racket, or some other thing and hit those blue balls while dodging the red ones. Hitting all bonus balls in a level will add 10x bonus points!
